page.title: 04JOANNE'S DAY. AGED 12
page.content: I got up late this morning because I had watched{Miami Vice,}the latest detective serial, until late last night. I got dressed hurriedly worrying that I might be late for school and not having had any breakfast, my stomach was rumbling like a frightened dog. I grabbed my bag and ran to school, dashed to registration for the sausage-string of names. I dawdled to lesson one, R.E. which was followed by a succession of lessons:gym, maths, French, English, General Science. The hours ticked by until 3.40p.m. which was{Hometime:} bliss! A time when I can go out with my friends. After I have spent an enjoyable evening with them, it's time for bed with a quick ten minutes of homework first!
